name: Introduction to Engineering
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of engineering and the aerospace engineering field.

name: Engineering Mathematics
description: This course covers basic mathematics used in engineering and the fundamentals of calculus.

name: Physics for Engineers
description: This course covers the fundamentals of physics and its application to engineering.

name: Design and Analysis of Aerospace Structures
description: This course covers the fundamentals of structural design and analysis of aerospace structures.

name: Aerodynamics
description: This course covers the fundamentals of aerodynamics and its application to aerospace engineering.

name: Propulsion Systems
description: This course covers the fundamentals of propulsion systems and its application to aerospace engineering.

name: Flight Dynamics
description: This course covers the fundamentals of flight dynamics and its application to aerospace engineering.
prerequisites: Design and Analysis of Aerospace Structures
